summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 20th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to a point approximately 225 feet north of East 58th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7089 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
